MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void BeginSession() cil managed

summary.span: 方法會指示 DSML 伺服器啟動新的工作階段。

span.span: The method instructs the DSML server to start a new session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會封鎖等候 DSML 伺服器的回應時，而且會根據逾屬性。The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the property.

exception.span: 當連接上已開啟工作階段時擲回。

span.span: Thrown when a session is already open on the connection.

exception.span: 當從伺服器傳回回應 之 XML 的格式不正確時擲回。

span.span: Thrown when the XML returned from the Server in response to the is not well-formed.

exception.span: 當與 DSML 伺服器的通訊失敗時，或者當伺服器耗盡可用工作階段時，擲回。

span.span: Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server or when the server is out of available sessions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument EndSendRequest(class System.IAsyncResult asyncResult) cil managed
Public Function EndSendRequest (asyncResult As IAsyncResult) As DsmlResponseDocument

summary.span: 方法會完成非同步傳送要求。

span.span: The method completes an asynchronous send request.

returns.span: 物件，其中包含要求的結果。

span.span: A object that contains the results of the request.

exception.span: 當 為 時擲回。

span.span: Thrown when is .

exception.span: 如果目前執行個體沒有在呼叫 之後傳回 ，則擲回。

span.span: Thrown if was not returned by the current instance from a call to .

exception.span: 要求沒有完成。

span.span: The request did not complete.

exception.span: 沒有可用的資料流。

span.span: No stream is available.

exception.span: 當伺服器傳回的回應無效時擲回。

span.span: Thrown when the response returned by server is not valid.

exception.span: 當先前已呼叫中止時，或者當處理要求期間發生錯誤時，擲回。

span.span: Thrown when abort was previously called or when an error occurred while processing the request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void EndSession() cil managed

summary.span: 方法會結束與 DSML 伺服器的工作階段，並清除 屬性。

span.span: The method ends the session with the DSML server and clears the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會封鎖等候 DSML 伺服器的回應時，而且會根據逾屬性。The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the property. 如果 DSML 的伺服器已終止工作階段本身，就會擲回。If the DSML server has already terminated the session on its own, a will be thrown. 如果是否仍然有效之後擲回例外狀況，要求永遠不會連線到伺服器，且連接仍然有效。If the is still valid after the exception is thrown, the request never reached the server and the connection is still considered valid.

exception.span: 當與 DSML 伺服器通訊失敗時擲回。

span.span: Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server.

exception.span: 當沒有開啟的工作階段時擲回。

span.span: Thrown when there is no open session.

summary.span: 將物件傳送至 DSML 伺服器。

span.span: Sends an object to the DSML server.

span.span: The DSML server returned an error response.

span.span: The operation returned a failure code.
